nodes.text: The Commercial District was the business region of Estalle on the planet Procopia. The service industries that kept the island running were located in the Commercial District, along with banks, restaurants, and bars. Major businesses maintained offices in the district, and large transportation hubs were situated within its boundary.

Locations within the Commercial District included the Tapani Royal Spaceport, Givoni Airport, Estalle Seaport, Corellian Merchants' Guild Guildhouse, Mining Guild Sector Headquarters, the Tapani Exchange, Shinda Center, Falley Club, Fairweld Casino, Drake Theatre, Chandler's Royale, Grand Royal Hotel, and the Tapani Imperial Hotel.
